TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfilePropertySettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ProfilePropertySettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the section of a configuration file.

span.span: The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the section of a configuration file.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够以编程方式创建、 访问和修改添加到的单个属性的定义`properties`的小节`profile`配置文件节。The class provides a way to programmatically create, access, and modify the definition of an individual property added to the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of a configuration file. `profile`配置文件的部分指定用户配置文件的架构。The `profile` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`部分，以生成一个名为类`ProfileCommon`，该类派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`的小节`profile`配置文件节。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 为每个用户配置文件中，创建此类的实例，你可以通过在代码中访问的各个配置文件值属性。An instance of this class is created for each user profile, and you can access the individual profile values in your code through the property. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 有关配置文件功能的详细信息添加到[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the profile features added to [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性值，其中包含一套对象。The following code example shows how to access the property value, which contains a collection of objects. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/CS/profilesection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/VB/profilesection.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`配置文件以生成类的部分调用`ProfileCommon`，该类派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 此类可以访问和修改单个用户配置文件的值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`的小节`profile`配置文件节。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 指定当创建的实例的参数值类将用于定义中的关联的属性`ProfileCommon`类。The parameter values that you specify when you create an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowAnonymous { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the associated property in the dynamically generated class can be set by anonymous users.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the associated property in the dynamically generated class can be set by anonymous users.

value.span: 如果中关联的属性该类可以设置匿名用户; 否则为，匿名用户无法更改属性值，该值指示。

span.span: if the associated property in the class can be set by anonymous users; otherwise, , indicating that anonymous users cannot change the property value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`配置文件以生成类的部分调用`ProfileCommon`，该类派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 此类可以访问和修改单个用户配置文件的值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`的小节`profile`配置文件节。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 指定的实例的属性值类将用于定义中的关联的属性`ProfileCommon`类。The property values that you specify for an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 如果中的属性将引发异常`ProfileCommon`类更改由匿名用户时属性值是`false`。An exception is thrown if a property in the `ProfileCommon` class is changed by an anonymous user when the property value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: A string of custom data for the profile property provider.

summary.span: Gets or sets the default value used for the associated property in the dynamically generated class.

span.span: Gets or sets the default value used for the associated property in the dynamically generated class.

value.span: 包含用于中动态生成的关联属性的默认值的字符串类。

span.span: A string containing the default value used for the associated property in the dynamically generated class.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`配置文件以生成类的部分调用`ProfileCommon`，该类派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 此类可以访问和修改单个用户配置文件的值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`的小节`profile`配置文件节。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 指定的实例的属性值类将用于定义中的关联的属性`ProfileCommon`类。The property values that you specify for an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 默认值为关联用作初始值`ProfileCommon`类属性，在单个用户配置文件不包含属性的值。The default value is used as the initial value for the associated `ProfileCommon` class property when an individual user profile does not contain a value for the property. 属性可以是一个字符串值，XML 编码的值 （该属性的序列化模式是 XML 序列化） 或 base 64 编码二进制字符串 （如果该属性的序列化模式是二进制序列化）。The property may be a string value, an XML-encoded value (serialization mode for the property is XML serialization) or a base-64-encoded binary string (if the serialization mode for the property is binary serialization). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Gets or sets the name of a provider to use when serializing the named property.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a provider to use when serializing the named property.

value.span: 从提供程序的名称属性或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The name of a provider from the property, or an empty string ("").

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件提供程序是在其中存储用户配置文件值的数据源。Profile providers are data sources in which user-profile values are stored. 你可以指定配置文件中的提供程序`providers`的小节`profile`配置文件节。You can specify profile providers in the `providers` subsection of the `profile` section of a configuration file. 如果此属性的值为空字符串，默认的提供程序中指定使用属性。If the value of this property is an empty string, the default provider specified in the property is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 一个有效的完全限定类型引用或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A valid, fully qualified type reference, or an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为有效的类型引用，该类型用于在生成的命名属性`ProfileCommon`类。When set to a valid type reference, this type is used for the named property in the generated `ProfileCommon` class. 按以下方式形成类型引用 （括号中的项不是必需的）： `Namespace.Typename, Assemblyname[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]`The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): `Namespace.Typename, Assemblyname[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]` 例如：For example: `"ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%"` ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
